feed.title: JRJ Cafe
feed.subtitle: For Food and Coffee lovers alike. Welcome to JRJ Cafe's website.

entry.title: Wine and Drinks
entry.content:
Wine

Brand Description In glass
Cava Merces, Spain 12
Blanco Seco Tajinaste, Canary Islands 14
Semillon Mother Rock, South Africa 10
Malbec RJ Vinedos, Argentina 13
Pinot Nero Colterenzio, Italy 14

Refreshments

Menu Description In glass
A Whole New World Mango, Champagne vinegar, jasmine 5
Lemongrass Lemonade Lemongrass, chamomile, lemon 4
Hot Tea Match super green, blueberry hibiscus, masala chai 3
Filtered Coffee Regular 3

entry.title: Vegetarian Menu
entry.content:
*Vegetarian/Vegan dishes are available in Ala Carte only.
*We advise our customers to tell the server if you have certain kind of food allergies.

Menu Description Per plate
Cabbage Hot Pot Kale, kimchi, sesame fu, black vinegar, grilled cabbage, raw raddish, cilantro (For Sharing) 30
West Indies Scramble Trinidadian chana stew, poha rice, crashed tofu, cilantro 12
Carrot Asado Adobo BBQ, smoked black beans, curtido 12

entry.title: GL (Gluten/Lactose) Free Diet
entry.content:
*Gluten/Lactose free dishes are available in Ala Carte only.
*We advise to tell the server if you have certain kind of food allergies.

Menu Description Per plate
Genoese Pasta in meat sauce 20
Cheese Stromboli Phillysteak with lactose-free cheese 15
Mussels Guiness & lemon, red, white or Fra Diavolo 13
entry.summary: *Gluten/Lactose free dishes are available in Ala Carte only. *We advise to tell the server if you have certain kind of food allergies.

entry.title: Sandwiches
entry.content:
*Gluten free bread available for sandwiches is Potato bun only.

Menu Description Price
Ham, Egg & Chips Slow cooked ham hock, fried egg, shoestring fries, picallili, malt vinegar mayo 8.50
BJ Benton Spiced Fritter, beetroot borani, labneh, sweet herbs, sumac, pickled pepper 8.50
Mangold Grilled brisket blend, melted cheddar, arugula, gruyere, potato bun 10
entry.summary: *Gluten free bread available for sandwiches is Potato bun only. Menu Description Price

entry.title: Coffee Menu
entry.content:
We brew the best coffee we can find from roasters we trust, tea from farms smaller than 15 acres and cook delicious brunches based on sourdough bread, organic eggs, seasonal fruit + vegetables.

We like to experiment and make as much as we can in house and whatever we can’t make comes from producers that aren’t based too far away.

Our counter is always stocked with cakes and cookies. With a bit of notice we can bake things to order. Just send us an email.
entry.summary: We brew the best coffee we can find from roasters we trust, tea from farms smaller than 15 acres and cook delicious brunches based on sourdough bread, organic eggs, seasonal fruit + vegetables.
